column4: UPDATE 3-Yahoo signs ad pact with Google; earnings and revenue miss
column5: Oct 20 Yahoo Inc said on Tuesday it had signed a search advertising deal with Google Inc  providing a potential boost to Marissa Mayer's efforts to turn around the company  which also reported revenue and profit that fell short of market estimates.

column4: Consumer Reports criticizes reliability of Tesla Model S
column5: DETROIT Consumer Reports said it would no longer recommend Tesla's Model S sedan due to reliability concerns  in a blow to the luxury electric-powered car initially awarded the highest-ever score in the U.S. magazine's performance ratings.
